title: What can you learn from ancient poop?

multiple-choice.question: What is the name of the host of the podcast "Gross Science"?
What is the term for fossilized poop?
According to the transcript, how do archaeologists typically find preserved poop?

options.label: B
options.text: By analyzing the contents of ancient cesspits

options.label: C
options.text: By studying the dents in the earth that get filled in

options.label: D
options.text: By analyzing the feces preserved in the corpse's rectum

multiple-choice.question: What can preserved poop reveal about ancient human diets?
What is an example of a preserved poop that was discovered in England?
What can preserved poop reveal about ancient human living conditions?
What is the name of the warlord who died after ingesting a poisonous plant, as revealed by preserved poop?
What can preserved poop reveal about ancient human living conditions in Puerto Rico?
What is the significance of preserved poop in the field of archaeology?

options.label: A
options.text: It provides information about ancient human diets and living conditions

options.label: B
options.text: It helps to reconstruct ancient human history

options.label: C
options.text: It provides evidence of ancient human culture and technology

multiple-choice.question: What can be inferred from the transcript about the importance of preserved poop in the field of archaeology?

options.label: B
options.text: It is a significant contribution to the field of archaeology

options.label: C
options.text: It is a new area of research
